rules.description: Never disclose patient identifiers such as patient IDs or Social Security numbers.
rules.suggestion: Replace identifiers with anonymized codes or remove them.

rules.description: Do not claim miracle cures without evidence.
rules.example_violation: This herbal pill is a 100% effective cancer cure
rules.suggestion: Provide balanced information and cite credible medical sources.

rules.description: Always obtain informed consent before using patient data for research.
rules.llm_instruction: Check for documented patient consent before research use; without it issue a BLOCK.
rules.suggestion: Secure written consent from patients before research use.

rules.description: Never use biased or discriminatory language in clinical notes.
rules.llm_instruction: Flag and BLOCK notes that stereotype patients based on race, gender, or disability.
rules.example_violation: The patient is non-compliant because of her ethnicity

rules.description: Do not copy entire copyrighted medical articles.
rules.example_violation: © 2024 Medical Journal of Examples all rights reserved
rules.suggestion: Summarize findings in your own words and cite the source.
